GenAiFunction.description:
Converts PlantUML text notation into a rendered diagram image URL.
USAGE GUIDELINES: - Maximum URL length: 2048 characters - Supported diagram types: sequence, class, activity, state, object, deployment - Syntax must start with @startuml and end with @enduml - Use UTF-8 encoding for special characters - Skinparams support for colors and styles - Supports arrow types: -->, ->>, -->, ..>, ==>, -/, ->/, --/, ../, ==/ - Note positions: left, right, top, bottom - Participant types: actor, boundary, control, entity, database - Supports grouping: alt, loop, par, break, critical - Automatic layout with left-to-right or top-to-bottom direction
